name: Wallchicken
description:
Need a list of trinkets, baubles, or other bric-a-brac that could be hidden in an alcove? Behind false bricks of a wall? Just want an item that has a vague air of mystery about it? This is your table. Roll a D100 or just pick one you like.

(Note - There is no wallchicken).

PDF is A4 sized 

Art by Oakydeer - https://twitter.com/OakyDeer
